text: Milunka Lazarević (1 December 1932 – 15 December 2018) was a Serbian chess player and journalist. She was the most known female player of Yugoslavia and became a contender for the Women's World Chess Championship. Lazarevic qualified as a Woman International Master in 1954 and a Woman Grandmaster in 1976. She was awarded the International Arbiter title in 1970. Lazarević was born in Šantarovac, Yugoslavia. She died on 15 December 2018 at the age of 86."In Memoriam – WGM Milunka Lazarević".
